"Okay, perfect!" I shouted to myself as I knew that my plan would become a success. I've always had a dream of shrinking myself down to a tiny height and submit myself to my now giant girlfriend. I never even knew it would be possible, but alas, it was about to be! Before I get any further, perhaps I should introduce myself! Hello, my name's Billy, and I'm 23-years old. I stand at 5 feet 10 inches, and weigh at 150 lbs. I have medium length blonde hair with green eyes. I'm not in the least bit in shape, but I'm definitely not out of shape as well. This is only the beginning of the horrible life that I will soon be dealing with because of you....

"Okay, shrink me!" I told my best friend as he nodded his head. He pointed the shrink ray at me and immediately pulled the trigger. My body, along with my clothes, because to dwindle in height as the shrink ray eventually stopped when I was now only 6-inches. "Whoa, it worked!" I shouted as my best friend walked up to me, his feet on either side. "Gosh, Billy, you're so tiny!" He laughed as he leaned down and picked me up. "Don't worry, I'll make sure that you get mailed to your girlfriends house!" Dropping me inside of the small box, he quickly poked some tiny holes and wrapped the box up like a present.

Humming to himself, he carried the box to his car and placed it on the passenger side. Buckling his seat belt, he pulled out of the drive way and headed down the road. Though, little do I know, he isn't actually taking me to my girlfriends house. He's taking me to the home of a person that he knew would love to turn me into their little sex toy to use and abuse me. This was a set up! I would soon regret asking him to help shrink me and take me to my girlfriends....

NOTE: The person that I'm being taken to is you. What is your relationship with me? An ex-girlfriend that hates me, a former best friend of mine that I screwed over, someone that I used to bully in high school, or perhaps my long lost brother/sister that I had a big falling out with last year? Whoever you decide to be, be sure to make me suffer!

info.brief_description: A 1st-person POV interactive roleplay! All can join! Please be sure to read the rules.
info.description:
THE MAIN STORYLINE:
In this interactive roleplay, I intentionally shrink myself with the intention of mailing myself to my girlfriend. However, the package gets sent to the wrong house. The moment you get the package and see the tiny 6-inch man inside, you decide to turn him into nothing but your little sex toy for you to use, abuse and humiliate in the most disgusting ways you can come up with! Enjoy your new toy!


RULES AND GUIDELINES FOR THE INTERACTIVE ROLEPLAY!
- The entire roleplay needs to be written in 1st-person point of view. (IE: I scream at the top of my lungs as you lean down to pick me up).
- I'm not asking you to write a novel. I just expect each response to be at least a paragraph or two long each time. No 1-4 sentences.
- In this roleplay, I'm the one that gets shrunk. You're the one that remains a giant and tortures me in some of the grossest ways possible!
- Spelling and grammar are definitely important. Make each of your replies and paragraphs look good. Typos are fine, as long as it isn't a lot.
- Each response should only have ONE option choice to pick, so that way it'll lead in only one direction. I will edit and remove multiple options.
- Do NOT add to anyone else's roleplay with me. There will be plenty of chances for you to join in on torturing me if you're interested in playing.
- Yes, I can be killed, or we can have my character become indestructible. If I die in it, don't kill me off too soon. Wait until the 15th+ chapter.
- Be detailed in your replies. Be honest, you don't enjoy reading posts that have little to no detail in them, right? They're boring to read.
- Toilet play, scat torture and piss play can be allowed, but keep it at a minimum. Mostly as a form of punishment.
- If you no longer wish to continue our roleplay, then please let me know so I can remove it to give people some more to join.
- I don't want any scenes that involve animals in it. That's too gross for me, and it's something I'm NOT into.

NOTE: I reserve the right to edit and/or delete any posts that violate any of the rules and guidelines listed above. If you comply with them, your post will remain the way you written it. Also, if you have any questions about this interactive roleplay before you decide to join in, or even while you're in the middle of a storyline with me, feel free to message me! I'll reply ASAP!
